column4: I am having trouble getting my SB Audigy 2 Soundcard to work.
paste the output from amixer onto paste.ubuntulinux.nl. More than likely you need to unmute the 'Audigy Analog/Digital Output Jack'.
crimsum - How do I get the output from my amixer, and how do I paste it to paste.ubuntulinux.nl
open a Terminal, type amixer. Paste the output onto the paste Web site.
unmute the 'Audigy Analog/Digital Output Jack' as I suggested.
or double-click the speaker icon in the upper right corner
- I don' t see 'Audigy Analog/Digital Output Jack' anywhere.
choose the ALSA device in the menu
in a Terminal, type amixer sset 'Audigy Analog/Digital Output Jack' on
Will I have to set it on everytime I boot-up?
